metadata.title: CVE-2024-6237 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the 389 Directory Server. This flaw allows anunauthenticated user to cause a systematic server crash while sending aspecific extended search request, leading to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
